timeline.message:
Improvements to Batch SDK testing

More environment variables for recording; documentation for running tests in both Record and Playback mode.

timeline.bodyText: This should likely either change return types to the TaskCountsResult model or another method should be added exposing taskSlotCounts as well
timeline.author: bgklein

replies.bodyText:
I added several other methods (getTaskCountsResult(), getTaskSlotCounts()) but kept this return type this intact. Doing otherwise would break the API.
Also added some assertions for slot counts in TasksTest:testGetTaskCounts()
replies.author: gingi
